# support-v1alpha1_locator (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `metadata` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--metadata))
- `spec` (Attributes) Enable the LED locator for a target.
This can be used to guide on-site technicians to the correct target requiring maintenance. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--spec))

### Optional

- `alarms` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms))
- `api_version` (String)
- `deviations` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--deviations))
- `kind` (String)
- `name` (String) name of the Locator
- `namespace` (String) the namespace scope in which to operate
- `status` (Attributes) LocatorStatus defines the observed state of Locator (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--status))

<a id="nestedatt--metadata"></a>
### Nested Schema for `metadata`

Required:

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

Optional:

- `annotations` (Map of String)
- `labels` (Map of String)


<a id="nestedatt--spec"></a>
### Nested Schema for `spec`

Optional:

- `duration_seconds` (Number) Duration in seconds to enable the locator for.
- `node_selectors` (List of String) List of selectors to select nodes to enable locator for.
This matches labels on TopoNode resources, including those TopoNodes in the list of nodes that locators will be enabled for.
- `nodes` (List of String) List of nodes to enable locator for.
Items in the list should be the names of the nodes, where each node will have its locator enabled for the specified duration.


<a id="nestedatt--alarms"></a>
### Nested Schema for `alarms`

Optional:

- `critical` (Number)
- `major` (Number)
- `minor` (Number)
- `warning` (Number)


<a id="nestedatt--deviations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `deviations`

Optional:

- `count` (Number)


<a id="nestedatt--status"></a>
### Nested Schema for `status`

Optional:

- `expiration_time` (String) Time when the locator will expire
